hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Breakout on 3-Day Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in NEUTRAL regime (61-70% confidence) for 5+ consecutive days, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper bound with 3-day volume exceeding 150% of 30-day average will signal transition to BULL regime with 85% accuracy within 3 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended neutral periods often precede directional breaks. Volume confirmation reduces false breakouts. Current MiCA regulatory clarity provides fundamental catalyst for bullish transition if technicals align.
entry_conditions: BTC regime confidence = 61-70% for 5+ consecutive days
Daily close > 20-day BB upper band (2 std dev)
ETH/BTC ratio > 0.0338 (current level) confirming altcoin participation

exit_conditions.take_profit: 7% gain from entry OR regime confidence shifts to BULL (>75%) for 2 consecutive days
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Daily close back inside BB bands OR 3% loss from entry
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days without regime transition confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 35% of such signals fail to produce BULL regime within 3 days OR result in immediate reversal to BEAR regime (>60% confidence) within 2 days.
